Attraction_Factors.userMessage: Year-on-year comparisons are not available for attraction factors due to methodology changes between 2024 and 2025.
Attraction_Factors.canonicalQuestion: What factors attract candidates to our organization?

Retention_Factors.userMessage: Year-on-year comparisons are not available for retention factors due to changes in question format between years.
Retention_Factors.canonicalQuestion: What factors contribute to employee retention?

Attrition_Factors.userMessage: Year-on-year comparisons are not available for attrition factors due to changes in response scales between 2024 and 2025.
Attrition_Factors.canonicalQuestion: What factors lead to employee attrition?

Manager_Capability.canonicalQuestion: How do employees rate their managers' capabilities?

Trust_and_Ethics.canonicalQuestion: How much do employees trust their organization?
